scripts.pretest: rm -rf tmp && mkdir -p tmp && cd tmp && git clone https://github.com/simpligility/maven-android-sdk-deployer.git && cd maven-android-sdk-deployer/ && mvn install -P 6.0 && ls ~/.m2/repository/android/android/
scripts.test: cd tmp && git clone https://github.com/hypery2k/cordova-demo-app.git && cd cordova-demo-app && npm install && npm run build && cordova platform add ${PLATFORM} && cordova plugin add cordova-plugin-compat && cordova build ${PLATFORM} && cordova plugin add ../.. && cordova plugin add http://git-wip-us.apache.org/repos/asf/cordova-plugin-test-framework.git
scripts.posttest: jsdoc -c jsdoc.json && jsdoc2md www/email_composer.js | sed s/emailComposerPlugin/cordova.plugins.email/g | sed s/EmailComposerPlugin/cordova.plugins.email/g > PLUGIN_USAGE.MD
